tool.name: OGS: PVD2XDMF
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'PVD2XDMF'.
tool.command: for i in $pvd_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; PVD2XDMF $pvd_file.element_identifier --output-directory output_1.vtu
tool.help: This tool runs the **PVD2XDMF** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
